customer_question: How do I reset my password?
support_agent_response:
You can reset your password by following these steps:
1. Go to the login page
2. Click on the 'Forgot Password' link
3. Enter your email address
4. Check your email for a password reset link
5. Click the link and enter a new password
If you have any issues, please don't hesitate to contact us.

customer_question: Can I upgrade my subscription plan?
support_agent_response:
Yes, you can upgrade your subscription plan at any time. To do so, please follow these steps:
1. Log into your account
2. Go to 'Account Settings'
3. Click on 'Subscription'
4. Choose your desired plan
5. Follow the prompts to complete the upgrade
If you need any assistance during the process, our support team is here to help!

Our refund policy is as follows:
- For monthly subscriptions: We offer a full refund if requested within the first 14 days of your subscription.
- For annual subscriptions: We offer a pro-rated refund for the unused portion of your subscription.
- One-time purchases: Refunds are available within 30 days of purchase, provided the product has not been downloaded or used.
Please note that all refund requests are subject to review. If you'd like to request a refund, please contact our support team with your order details.

customer_question: How can I contact customer support?
support_agent_response:
There are several ways to contact our customer support team:
1. Email: support@example.com
2. Live Chat: Available on our website during business hours (9 AM - 5 PM EST, Monday-Friday)
3. Phone: Call us at 1-800-123-4567 (toll-free)
4. Support Ticket: Log into your account and submit a ticket through the 'Help' section
We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

customer_question: Is there a mobile app available?
support_agent_response:
Yes, we have mobile apps available for both iOS and Android devices. You can download them from the following locations:
- iOS: Apple App Store
- Android: Google Play Store
Our mobile app offers most of the features available on the web version, allowing you to access your account on-the-go. If you encounter any issues with the app, please let us know, and we'll be happy to assist you.

customer_question: How do I cancel my subscription?
support_agent_response:
To cancel your subscription, please follow these steps:
1. Log into your account
2. Go to 'Account Settings'
3. Click on 'Subscription'
4. Select 'Cancel Subscription'
5. Follow the prompts to confirm cancellation
Please note that cancelling your subscription will stop future billing, but you'll retain access to your account until the end of your current billing period. If you have any questions about cancellation or would like to provide feedback, please don't hesitate to contact us.

customer_question: What payment methods do you accept?
support_agent_response:
We accept a variety of payment methods to make it convenient for our customers. Currently, we support the following:
1. Credit/Debit Cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Discover)
2. PayPal
3. Bank Transfer (for annual subscriptions only)
4. Apple Pay (for iOS users)
5. Google Pay (for Android users)
If you're having trouble with a payment method or have questions about a specific option, please let us know, and we'll be glad to help.

customer_question: How can I change my email address?
support_agent_response:
To change the email address associated with your account, please follow these steps:
1. Log into your account
2. Go to 'Account Settings'
3. Click on 'Personal Information'
4. Enter your new email address in the 'Email' field
5. Click 'Save Changes'
6. You'll receive a confirmation email at your new address. Click the link in that email to verify the change.
For security reasons, you may be asked to re-enter your password. If you encounter any issues during this process, please contact our support team for assistance.

customer_question: Do you offer a free trial?
support_agent_response:
Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial for all new users. During the trial, you'll have full access to all features of our premium plan. To start your free trial:
1. Go to our website and click 'Start Free Trial'
2. Create an account with your email and password
3. No credit card is required for the trial
After the 14-day trial period, you can choose to subscribe to one of our paid plans or continue with a limited free version. We'll send you a reminder email before your trial expires. If you have any questions during your trial, our support team is here to help!

customer_question: How do I export my data?
support_agent_response:
Exporting your data is a straightforward process. Here's how you can do it:
1. Log into your account
2. Go to 'Settings' or 'Account Management'
3. Look for an 'Export Data' or 'Download My Data' option
4. Choose the type of data you want to export (e.g., all data, specific date range)
5. Select your preferred format (usually CSV or JSON)
6. Click 'Export' or 'Download'
Depending on the amount of data, the export process may take a few minutes to complete. You'll receive an email with a download link once your export is ready. If you need any specific data that's not included in the standard export, please contact our support team, and we'll do our best to assist you.
